verses.name: Hosea 5:1
verses.text: Hear ye this, O priests; and hearken, ye house of Israel; and give ye ear, O house of the king; for judgment is toward you, because ye have been a snare on Mizpah, and a net spread upon Tabor.

verses.name: Hosea 5:2
verses.text: And the revolters are profound to make slaughter, though I have been a rebuker of them all.

verses.name: Hosea 5:3
verses.text: I know Ephraim, and Israel is not hid from me: for now, O Ephraim, thou committest whoredom, and Israel is defiled.
